r.n: - fix gh#247 when a NUL char is used as key, apcu_fetch(array) truncates the key - fix gh#248 apcu_fetch may return values causing zend_mm_corruption or segfaults when custom serializer is used - fix gh#260 apcu.serializer=default results in segfault - fix gh#274 non-portable shell == in config.m4 - fix crash when passing bad array to apcu_delete - improve fix gh#266 refcounting errors in APCIterator - fix for PHP 7.3 compatibility
